channel.title: newsletter on Pulsar Neighborhood
channel.description: Recent content in newsletter on Pulsar Neighborhood

item.title: Happenings in the Pulsar Neighborhood Feb '22
item.description: For this issue, a new PMC member, 2 new committers, a call to help improve the quality of the code, a meetup in Italian, and a new and improved home page coming soon. Plus our normal features of a Stack Overflow question and some monthly community stats.

item.title: Happenings in the Pulsar Neighborhood Jan 22
item.description: For this issue, we have some end of the year stats, Log4j updates, a new PMC member, and lots of talks. Plus our normal features of a Stack Overflow question and some monthly community stats.
